headline: Hershey to drop synthetic dyes from its snacks by 2027
summary: Hershey said on Tuesday it would remove synthetic dyes from its snacks by the end of 2027, making it the latest in a growing list of companies seeking to align with directives from U.S. health...

headline: HERSHEY Wraps Principal Photography in Pennsylvania
summary: The upcoming major motion picture HERSHEY–about the inspiring true story of founder Milton S. Hershey–has concluded principal photography, wrapping over seven weeks of filming across Hershey's home state of Pennsylvania.
